name: D12 230 PRO SMARTPAD MONO DUAL 0.4 nozzle
printer_model: Wanhao D12 230 PRO SMARTPAD MONO DUAL
machine_end_gcode:
; Wanhao D12 Default End Gcode
SAVE_VARIABLE VARIABLE=was_interrupted VALUE=False ;stop variable plr
clear_last_file ;clean file
RUN_SHELL_COMMAND CMD=clear_plr ;clear plr
G1 E-30 F6000  ; Retract 30mm of filament at a speed of 6000 mm/min
G4 P3000       ; Pause for 3000 milliseconds (3 seconds)
G92 E0         ; Reset the extruder position to 0
G1 E-40 F6000  ; Retract an additional 40mm of filament at a speed of 6000 mm/min
M400           ; Wait for all movements to finish
M107           ; Turn off the part cooling fan
M106 S0        ; Ensure the fan is off (redundant with M107)
M104 S0        ; Turn off the hotend heater
M140 S0        ; Turn off the heated bed
G91            ; Set to relative positioning mode
G1 Z5 F1200    ; Move the nozzle up 5mm at a speed of 1200 mm/min
G90            ; Set back to absolute positioning mode
G1 X0 Y235 F1200  ; Move to X=0, Y=235 at a speed of 1200 mm/min (park position)
M84            ; Disable all stepper motors (release motors)
machine_start_gcode:
G31
save_last_file
SAVE_VARIABLE VARIABLE=was_interrupted VALUE=True
G21                                ; set metrics values
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]               ; set extruder temperature
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]           ; set bed temperature
G91                                ; set relative positioning mode
G28                                ; home
G90                                ; set absolute positioning mode
G1 X0 Y0                       ; park head
M117                                ; Purge extrudeur
G92 E0                             ; Reset extrudeur
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]                         ; set and wait extruder temperature
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]            ; set and wait bed temperature
BED_MESH_CALIBRATE ADAPTIVE=1 ADAPTIVE_MARGIN=5 ; adaptive bed leveling
G1 Z1.0 F3000                      ; Prepare head for first purge line
M83                                ; set relative positioning for extruder
G1 X0.1 Y20 Z0.3 F5000.0           ; Set head to first line start position
G1 X0.1 Y210 Z0.3 F750.0 E15  ; First line
G1 X0.4 Y210 Z0.3 F5000.0     ; Move slightly on the side
G1 X0.4 Y20 Z0.3 F750.0 E15        ; Second line
G1 E-5 F1800                       ; Filament Retract
M82                                ; set absolute positioning for extruder
G92 E0                             ; Reset extrudeur
G1 Z1.0 F3000                      ; Moving up slightly the nozzle
